properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 1 at 4:02AM MST until February 4 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7
inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph mainly along
and north of Highway 40 Monday afternoon through Tuesday
morning.

* WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin.

* WHEN...From late Sunday night through Tuesday evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with patchy
blowing snow significantly reducing visibility, especially in
open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING
